# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.hspice ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.hspice ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND  XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/NODESET/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} nodeset_global_node_warning.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/NODESET/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/NODESET/nodeset_global_node_warning.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice;ic;nodeset")
endif()
